description: Lists all classifier objects in the Data Catalog.

nested_items.name: Classifiers
nested_items.description: The requested list of classifier objects.

nested_items.name: GrokClassifier
nested_items.description: A classifier that uses grok.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the classifier.

nested_items.name: Classification
nested_items.description: An identifier of the data format that the classifier matches, such as Twitter, JSON, Omniture logs, and so on.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The time that this classifier was registered.

nested_items.name: LastUpdated
nested_items.description: The time that this classifier was last updated.

nested_items.name: Version
nested_items.description: The version of this classifier.

nested_items.name: GrokPattern
nested_items.description: The grok pattern applied to a data store by this classifier. For more information, see built-in patterns in Writing Custom Classifiers.

nested_items.name: CustomPatterns
nested_items.description: Optional custom grok patterns defined by this classifier. For more information, see custom patterns in Writing Custom Classifiers.

nested_items.name: XMLClassifier
nested_items.description: A classifier for XML content.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the classifier.

nested_items.name: Classification
nested_items.description: An identifier of the data format that the classifier matches.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The time that this classifier was registered.

nested_items.name: LastUpdated
nested_items.description: The time that this classifier was last updated.

nested_items.name: Version
nested_items.description: The version of this classifier.

nested_items.name: RowTag
nested_items.description: The XML tag designating the element that contains each record in an XML document being parsed. This can't identify a self-closing element (closed by />). An empty row element that contains only attributes can be parsed as long as it ends with a closing tag (for example, <row item_a="A" item_b="B"></row> is okay, but <row item_a="A" item_b="B" /> is not).

nested_items.name: JsonClassifier
nested_items.description: A classifier for JSON content.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the classifier.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The time that this classifier was registered.

nested_items.name: LastUpdated
nested_items.description: The time that this classifier was last updated.

nested_items.name: Version
nested_items.description: The version of this classifier.

nested_items.name: JsonPath
nested_items.description: A JsonPath string defining the JSON data for the classifier to classify. Glue supports a subset of JsonPath, as described in Writing JsonPath Custom Classifiers.

nested_items.name: CsvClassifier
nested_items.description: A classifier for comma-separated values (CSV).

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the classifier.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The time that this classifier was registered.

nested_items.name: LastUpdated
nested_items.description: The time that this classifier was last updated.

nested_items.name: Version
nested_items.description: The version of this classifier.

nested_items.name: Delimiter
nested_items.description: A custom symbol to denote what separates each column entry in the row.

nested_items.name: QuoteSymbol
nested_items.description: A custom symbol to denote what combines content into a single column value. It must be different from the column delimiter.

nested_items.name: ContainsHeader
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the CSV file contains a header.

nested_items.name: Header
nested_items.description: A list of strings representing column names.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: DisableValueTrimming
nested_items.description: Specifies not to trim values before identifying the type of column values. The default value is true.

nested_items.name: AllowSingleColumn
nested_items.description: Enables the processing of files that contain only one column.

nested_items.name: CustomDatatypeConfigured
nested_items.description: Enables the custom datatype to be configured.

nested_items.name: CustomDatatypes
nested_items.description: A list of custom datatypes including 'BINARY', 'BOOLEAN', 'DATE', 'DECIMAL', 'DOUBLE', 'FLOAT', 'INT', 'LONG', 'SHORT', 'STRING', 'TIMESTAMP'.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Serde
nested_items.description: Sets the SerDe for processing CSV in the classifier, which will be applied in the Data Catalog. Valid values are OpenCSVSerDe, LazySimpleSerDe, and None. You can specify the None value when you want the crawler to do the detection.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: A continuation token.
